name: <**REQUIRED** The name of the release.>
organization: <OPTIONAL - Either YOUR PROGRAM NAME or U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service
description: <**REQUIRED** A one or two sentence description of the release.>
status: <OPTIONAL - The development status of the release, one of: Ideation | Development | Alpha | Beta | Release Candidate | Production | Archival>
repositoryURL: <**REQUIRED** The URL of the public release repository for open source repositories. This field is not required for repositories that are only available as government-wide reuse or are closed (pursuant to one of the exemptions).>

contact.name: <**REQUIRED** The email address for the point of contact for the release.>
contact.email: <**REQUIRED** The name of the point of contact for the release.>

date.created: OPTIONAL - The date the release was created, in YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 format.
date.lastModified: OPTIONAL - The date the release was modified, in YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 format.
date.metadataLastUpdated: OPTIONAL - The date the metadata of the release was last updated, in YYYY-MM-DD or ISO 8601 format.
